snippet: Britain’s new envoy to Tehran will travel to Iran on Tuesday, the first diplomatic visit by a British official since Britain’s embassy in Tehran was stormed more than two years ago.
abstract: Ajay Sharma, Britain's new envoy to Iran, will travel to Iran on the first diplomatic visit by a British official since its embassy in Tehran was stormed more than two years ago.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s new envoy to Tehran will travel to Iran on Tuesday, the first diplomatic visit by a British official since Britain’s embassy in Tehran was stormed more than two years ago.

headline.main: Britain: Envoy Aims to Mend Iran Ties
headline.print_headline: Britain: Envoy Aims to Mend Iran Ties
